newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks close higher on budget hopes.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks close higher on budget hopes.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed higher on Thursday on hopes that the 1997/98 budget to be announced later in the day might spell out measures to boost the capital market, brokers said.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all-share price index closed 1.05 percent up at 1,157.43 on a turnover of 53.4 million taka. Of 132 issues traded 93 gained, 31 lost and eight were unchanged.
Monno Jutex Industries Ltd gained 171 taka to 3,921, United Leasing Company gained 38.44 taka to 2,541.77 while Pdma Textile Mills shed 7.48 to 494.14.
